content:
Since my existence began, I've been told to either stop talking, writing, or attempting to be whoever I am. While these directives often don't fare well in life, writing has always been my sanctuary. There are moments of inspiration where I delicately tie the finest and most delicate bows, spinning my words like silk and accentuating the craft with sheen and care.

My poetry delves into the mysteries of blackness and depth, not in emotion but in intellectual exploration. When you look deeper, you'll find no end, no bottomâ€”only darkness pierced by pinpricks of light, symbolizing my heart and all that I am. As I write, my words pulse and the act of typing makes them grow, drawing you into my universe. It's a show I create just for you, and unknowingly, you've become my muse. So take a dance or a stroll through my verses, find your pace in the meter of my words, and discover solace beyond with these writings.
Spectral Tapestry is currently in talks to get published, stay tuned for more info!
